findings.title: One-way indemnification obligation
findings.rationale: Indemnification obligations that apply to only one party can create asymmetric risk exposure.

This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.

findings.title: Liability cap carve-outs may negate protection
findings.rationale: Liability caps that exclude indemnity, confidentiality, or IP claims often negate the practical benefit of the cap entirely.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY Limitation of liability shall not apply to indemnification, confidentiality, or intellectual property claims....

ee (3) years from the date of execution.

4. INDEMNIFICATION
The Receiving Party shall indemnify the Disclosing Party to the extent required by law for all claims arising from breach of this Agreement.

5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
Limitation of liability shall not apply to indemnification, confidentiality, or intellectual property claims.

6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
No intellectual property provisions apply.

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.

8. RENEWAL
This Agreement may be renewed by mutual written consent.

9. AUDIT RIGHTS
No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

10. LATE FEES
No late fees apply.

11. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by applicable law.

12. DEFINITIONS
Confidential Information means information marked as confidential.

This Agreement is executed on 2024-01-01.

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
